title: ABOUT ME
content: I'm Michael — a software engineer and creative who loves building tools, interfaces, and experiences that feel intuitive, meaningful, and beautifully made.

After graduating as a mechanical engineer, I pivoted into tech and never looked back. I've worked across education, sustainability, and e-commerce — building everything from multi-tenant dashboards for smart heating systems to digital platforms for renowned design institutions.
Outside of work, I write and produce music. I like to think of code and music as structured chaos with room for beauty.
